text: Kevin Clash (born September 17, 1960) is an American puppeteer and voice actor. Clash formerly performed Elmo on Sesame Street. He has also performed Splinter from Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles, Clifford from Muppets Tonight, and Baby Sinclair from Dinosaurs. Mr. Clash was an important part of Sesame Street Workshop and often performed as Elmo in hospitals for sick children. Mr. Clash was well known for his ability to improvise. On November 20, 2012, Clash left Sesame Street Workshop due to multiple allegations of sexual abuse of minors. The cases and lawsuits were later dismissed because the statute of limitations had passed. ==Filmography== Year Title Role(s) 1983–2012 Sesame Street Elmo, Baby Fats Domino, Benny Rabbit, Billy Idle,
